QuestData.Title: Delaying the Other Side
QuestData.Description:
Many of Bwonsamdi's worshippers did not make it inside when de undead began swarming de Necropolis.
We need a few more of dem to complete Bwonsamdi's ritual to uncover Mueh'zala's plans.
Take dis powder and throw it on de worshippers who are stuck outside. It should dispel de dark magic dat afflicts dem.
As for de ones who are already dead... dey will serve Bwonsamdi beyond de grave. Dat is all we could ever ask for.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Strange Powder on $1oa Injured Bwonsamdi Worshippers.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah good, ya got me all da livin' souls I be needin'.
Don't ya be worryin' about da ones who passed on. Ol' Bwonsamdi not lettin' dem go to da Maw.
